definition: a slight push or shake, stimulate to remember
details:
noun
- a slight push or shake
= synonyms: nudge
- a slow pace of running
= synonyms: trot, lope
- a sharp change in direction
= example: a sharp change in direction
verb
- stimulate to remember
= example: stimulate to remember
- give a slight push to
- run at a moderately swift pace
= synonyms: clip, trot
- run for exercise
= example: run for exercise
- even up the edges of a stack of paper, in printing
= synonyms: square up, even up
- continue talking or writing in a desultory manner
= example: continue talking or writing in a desultory manner
= synonyms: ramble
